title: 📝 Daily Summary — Feb 20, 2026
content:
# **February 20, 2026**

## What We Built

### Mission Control
- **TikTok Dashboard** — complete script-to-video pipeline
  - Scripts tab: status lanes (draft/review/approved/generated), drag-drop cards, filters
  - Videos tab: Runway Gen4.5 integration for AI video generation
  - "Send to Phone" via Telegram API (sends scripts + videos to mobile)
  - Created `tiktok_scripts` Supabase table + `/api/tiktok/scripts` CRUD endpoint
  - Seeded with 7 starter scripts
- **Sentry Dashboard** — error monitoring + issue tracking
  - Added 🛡️ Sentry tab to main navigation
  - Built `/api/sentry/route.js` for issues/events API
  - Sentry project: "stratify" (org: jeff-thompson-uy, ID: 4510920320811008)

### Stratify
- **LiveChart.jsx** — real-time candle charts with TradingView Lightweight Charts v5
  - Twelve Data WebSocket integration for live price streaming
  - Replaced static Highcharts on Watchlist Trade tab
  - Pre/post market data via `prepost=true` flag
- **Portfolio Analytics Restored** — brought back original 596-line AnalyticsPage
  - Total P&L, Win Rate, Sharpe Ratio, Max Drawdown metrics
  - Monthly Returns grid, Trade Distribution, Strategy Performance tables
  - Fixed sub-agent mistake (had replaced with stock charting)
- **Economics Calendar Page** — dedicated economic events view
  - FairEconomy API (`ff_calendar_thisweek.json`) — free tier, CPI/Fed/NFP/GDP events
  - Impact levels (high/medium/low), today highlight
  - Removed TradingView EconCalendar widget from FRED page
- **Highcharts Stock experiments** — multiple iterations:
  - Built GUI toolbar on Community page with indicators + drawing tools
  - Created analytics version with equity curve, allocation pie, win rate gauges
  - Proxied economic calendar API through Vercel to avoid CORS
  - Eventually rolled back to LiveChart for Trade tab
- **Chart features** — drawing tools, interval persistence, zoom controls
  - Horizontal/trend/vertical lines, fibonacci, parallel channel
  - Auto-fit Y-axis on zoom, drag-to-scale on price labels
  - localStorage persistence for interval, candle theme, symbol
- **UI refinements**
  - Removed green "+Add" buttons from search bars (WatchlistPage, TradePage)
  - Fixed economic calendar height overflow
  - Removed Advanced Trading page from sidebar
  - Moved Crypto tab under Trade section
  - Disabled shooting stars on app background (performance)

## What We Fixed

### Mission Control
- `/api/skills/last30days` — rewrote to call Claude API directly (OpenClaw gateway unreachable from Vercel serverless functions)

### Stratify
- **Sentry SDK integration** — installed `@sentry/react`, initialized in `main.jsx`
- **Gray screen bug hunt** — multiple attempts to isolate Highcharts bundle crashes:
  - Extracted stock database to shared file (broke circular import)
  - Lazy-loaded TradePage and AnalyticsPage
  - Removed ALL Highcharts from main bundle
  - Eventually debugged by removing Sentry temporarily
- **Chart issues**
  - Fixed bottom cutoff: removed navigator, forced flex-row layout, overflow-hidden containers
  - Fixed Y-axis scrollbar (initially broken)
  - Fixed navigator handles: bigger green with white chevron grip lines
  - Chart timezone locked to New York
- **LiveChart persistence** — interval + visible range now persists across tab navigation
- **Market price sync** — fixed advanced order ticket market price sync with WebSocket quotes
- **Shooting stars animation** — constant speed (linear), tail-to-head fadeout, no slowdown

## Key Decisions

### APIs & Data
- **FairEconomy over Twelve Data** for economic calendar (earnings_calendar paywalled on current Twelve Data plan)
- **TradingView Lightweight Charts over Highcharts** for Trade tab (simpler, better WebSocket integration)
- **Twelve Data WebSocket** for live candle updates across all chart components

### Architecture
- **Mission Control Skills endpoint** — Claude API direct calls (not via OpenClaw gateway) from Vercel
- **AnalyticsPage = portfolio metrics** (win rate, Sharpe, drawdown), NOT stock charting
- **Removed per-user analytics preferences** — not needed for original AnalyticsPage design

### Design
- **No green pill buttons** — plain text only (permanent UI rule)
- **Chart transparency** — starfield passthrough on V2 Community page
- **Navigator style** — green handles with grip icons, taller track

## Important Info

### Sentry
- **Project:** stratify
- **Org:** jeff-thompson-uy
- **Project ID:** 4510920320811008
- **Auth token:** pending creation (needs Issue & Event→Admin, Organization→Read permissions)

### FairEconomy API
- **Endpoint:** `ff_calendar_thisweek.json` (free tier)
- **Coverage:** CPI, Fed meetings, NFP, GDP, major economic events
- **Impact levels:** high/medium/low color-coded badges

### Git Activity
- **Stratify:** 78 commits today
  - Chart experiments (Highcharts Stock, LiveChart, drawing tools)
  - Analytics page restoration
  - Economic calendar + Sentry integration
  - UI cleanup (removed green buttons, fixed overflows)
- **Second Brain:** 14 cron commits
  - X engagement runs (hourly)
  - Market intel scans (2-4 hour intervals)
  - Trade logs, Trump intel, daily summary

## Blocked Items

1. **Mission Control Vercel env vars** — need to add:
   - `SENTRY_AUTH_TOKEN` (Jeff creating token with Issue & Event→Admin, Organization→Read)
   - `ANTHROPIC_API_KEY` (for Skills endpoint)
2. **Sentry Dashboard** — blocked until auth token added to env vars

## Next Steps

- Jeff decides: enhance AnalyticsPage with Highcharts or keep CSS-based metrics
- Complete Sentry token setup + add to Vercel env vars
- Wire TikTok cron agents to auto-save scripts to `tiktok_scripts` table
- Verify LiveChart WebSocket live updates on deployed Stratify site
- Test TikTok "Send to Phone" flow end-to-end (script → Runway Gen4.5 → Telegram)

## Notes

- **Chart journey:** Started with TradingView embed (iframe), tried Lightweight Charts (sticky UX), tested Highcharts Stock ($732/yr license), landed on Lightweight Charts for Trade tab
- **Analytics confusion:** Sub-agent wrongly replaced portfolio metrics page with stock charting — restored from git history
- **Shooting stars disabled:** Performance optimization (animations can lag on lower-end devices)
- **TikTok Dashboard ready:** Full pipeline built, waiting on cron agent integration for automated script generation
